text: He was the first to cross to the attack, with all the people behind him, and all the Gentiles were crushed before them. They threw away their arms and fled to the temple enclosure at Carnaim.
“You have heard that it was said, ‘You shall love your neighbor and hate your enemy.'
He gave strict orders that no one should know this and said that she should be given something to eat.
I came in the name of my Father, but you do not accept me; yet if another comes in his own name, you will accept him.
